data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Sucre, Colombia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sucre, Colombia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Sucre, Colombia.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Sucre to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Sucre who will make disciples who make disciples.
Jesus, I pray that all the Siripu people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Siripu people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Siripu people is yours.
Lord, to the people of Sucre you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Sucre who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.section_summary:
the state of Sucre, Colombia has a population of 949,300.

We estimate Sucre has 101,873 people who might know Jesus, 786,412 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 61,014 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Sucre to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."
